name: Soul Binding
action: Extended (target number = one for a Sleeper's soul, Gnosis for a mage's soul)
effect: The mage can attach a stolen soul to himself or another, but only if he or the target currently has no soul. The target number is equal to the recipient's Gnosis, or simply one success if the target is a Sleeper. The soul then belongs to the recipient.

rotes.roteDescription: Used far more often to attach a soul to another who has been left soulless than for the Council mage's own benefit, this rote has preserved the sanity of many an unwitting pawn dragged into the struggles of the Awakened.
